resources.string: Before we begin, tell me, what is your name?
Ah, so your name is %s. Very well, %s, let\'s see what adventures await!
Now, before we continue, you had a strange dream last night, didn\'t you? What was it about again?
You don\'t know how you got there, but you were under water, drowning.
You were in a burning building. The flames towered around you, and there was no escape
You were lifted into the air by a huge gust of wind, and tossed around like a doll in gail force winds high above the air
